name: Tavern's Without Walls
description:
Tavern's Without Walls and the boss at the counter top

Is a sokoban-style game where you need to serve the correct items to the customers. The boss owns a bunch of taverns and she wants you to work on every one of them. She will be nagging at you non-stop but do not let that bother you and serve the correct item to the customers. Be careful not to push items on the edge. The taverns have no walls.

Instructions:

[WASD/Arrow Keys] - Movement

[T] - Rewind moves

[R] - Reset the game

[ESC] - Exit the game

Credits:

- Music  made in Bosca Ceoil

- Assets bought from Unity Asset Store 

(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/cube-world-proto-series-14...)

(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/gui/polygon-icons-pack-low-poly-3d-art-...)

- Fonts from Kenney.nl

(https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts) 

- Everything else made by Necther Louie Souribio (minibite)
